data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kmrOrz8lpXAQ7kNvgEllxzi&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCX1X54w3qHyfgRLjGOyarcY6uj0Gz6-brAiRSu87UQ7w&oe=67052B8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f71e9Tcd-LwQ7kNvgFB6Osz&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA4OxbcDr7AnAyRQkw2EeJ_wexITfeANJ8DJyxUmjxs2g&oe=6705299F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tCKwE6ksjJsQ7kNvgFJMD7i&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB34iPndE-GWZ-KlpQ1QB8_rxVpqGgypZomuiX0ZOqfig&oe=67050EF1)
